result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Donte N Thomas

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Donte N Thomas in court, in custody.  Attorney Manuel Raymundo Galang in court for Donte N Thomas.  Attorney Jennifer Tate for William T. Berens in court for State of Wisconsin.  
Parties have reached a resolution. State places offer on the record. Defense and defendant are in agreement.  Defendant changes plea to GUILTY as to COUNT 1.  

Defendant examined as to plea, advised of Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.  Defendant further advised that if not a US citizen deportation is possible. Court found that defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived their rights.  Plea questionnaire, addendum and jury instructions received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant guilty as charged in the information and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  

Defendant is advised is a convicted felon and may not possess any firearms.  
Defendant is advised unable to vote in any election until civil rights are restored.  

Matter adjourned for sentencing hearing in Branch 4.
Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 12, 2023 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Donte N Thomas not in court, in custody.  Attorney Manuel Raymundo Galang in court for Donte N Thomas.  Attorney Megan Newport William T. Berens in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense request plea hearing for today. Case passed until the afternoon.

Defendant Donte N Thomas not in court, in custody.  Attorney Manuel Raymundo Galang in court for Donte N Thomas.  Attorney William T. Berens in court for State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status conference. Discovery and offer received. Defense requests plea and sentencing date. Case passed until afternoon.

Defendant Donte N Thomas appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Manuel Raymundo Galang in court for Donte N Thomas.  Prosecuting attorney William T. Berens in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status. Defendant has another pending matter before the Court, which has been adjourned. This case to follow. Case adjourned. Case remains calendared in Br 4.
Status conference scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Donte N Thomas not in court, in custody.  Attorney Manuel Raymundo Galang in court for Donte N Thomas.  Prosecuting attorney William T. Berens in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status. Defendant  has a pending  matter before the court, which has been adjourned. This case to follow. Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 04.
Status conference scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Donte N Thomas in court with attorney Manuel Raymundo Galang.  Defendant Donte N Thomas in custody.  William T. Berens appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State advises cases no joined and would intend to take case 2020CF2623 to trial first. Case will tag along as a status. Case adjourned in Branch 4.  Status conference scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 11:30 am.  Status conference scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.
State's Motion in Limine, received and filed.

Defendant Donte N Thomas in court with attorney Manuel Raymundo Galang.  Chad Wozniak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed by the final pretrial date. Any other motions must be filed by the final pretrial. Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 4.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 19, 2022 at 11:00 am.  Jury trial scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Manuel Raymundo Galang in court, defendant Donte N Thomas not in court, in custody.  Chad Wozniak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Case in court for status conference. Discovery and offer received. Defense requests projected guilty plea date. Case remains calendared in Branch 4.  Plea hearing scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Attorney Manuel Raymundo Galang in court, defendant Donte N Thomas not in court, in custody.  Chad Wozniak appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means for .  Case in court for scheduling conference. Defense requests more time for review. Defense request taht defendant's other case 20CF2623 be set for the same date. State does not object. Court grants. Case remains calendared in Branch 4.  Status conference scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Donte N Thomas in court with attorney Manuel Raymundo Galang.  Defendant Donte N Thomas in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Donte N Thomas appeared by video means with Attorney.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 04, Judge Hanrahan. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 04.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Donte N Thomas in court with attorney Angel L Johnson.  Defendant Donte N Thomas in custody.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Donte N Thomas appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Hanrahan, Branch 04. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 23, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Donte N Thomas not in court.   No Assistant District Attorney Available appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Initial appearance scheduled for this date 2/18/2022. Defendant is in custody at Stanley Correctional. Needs to be produced for court.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 2/18/22 @ 2:30p
